comment: Awful teacher. Gave me multiple zeros on assignments that I turned in. Not helpful when I emailed her. Couldn't access assignments after the due date. Problem with an assignment? couldn't see until after you got a 0. wouldn't take credit if there was a problem because it was "too late" after she gave a 0. save yourself and pick someone else.
Awful! Not willing to help you one bit. Regretted every minute of taking her class!!!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: My biggest issue with Owens is that she decided to switch her grading style halfway through the class which resulted in over half of us getting an F on the first major assignment. I'm one of the lucky ones but after that its basically impossible to get an A in a class. It was like a lot of busy work but none of it was too hard. Grades very weirdly!
